Caption: Dr. P. Subbarayan (Union Minister of Transport and Communication) gives away prize to an awardee
Description: The Chief Guest, Dr. P. Subbarayan (Union Minister of Transport and Communication) distributed a number of prizes to students, faculty members and others involved with the Institution at the Third Institute Day. The Institute Day of IIT Madras is a day marked to celebrate the hard work and success of certain people who have shown excellence in academics as well as extracurricular activities. In the image, Dr. P. Subbarayan gives away prize to an awardee.  Also seen in the image are Prof. Sankaran (the gentleman wearing glasses behind the awardee), Mr. R. Natarajan (seated) and Mr. Anand Singh Bawa (standing on the dais). Identification by Mr. K. Narayanan, Mr. C. V. Sahasranamam and Mr. Anand Singh Bawa.
